text: “Mba shama bakɨme mbui guman ŋaara guma, ana mba gumgir nzaim, mbe mba kamen ana suaŋgim, ana mba kameŋ ndiga taagia won guma ruma han vui. Ana vov mba mbe suaŋgi buni bun wo guma ruma suaŋgi. Ana mba buni bun won guma ruma nzuaim, ana ndav shigap, thav kama havharar won ŋaara guma ga ndɨɨv khaŋ ana nzuai, ‘Ndu vhemkora ŋgɨp, kha ŋgu bakɨmen ki tuavi bakɨvi gum tuavi bisarirer ŋgɨp, mba bigi sosuagi gumgi gum, suira mbatɨgi gumgi gum, rɨmgi mbatɨgi gumgi gum, hari gu suira goreregi gumgi, ndu mbe suaŋrim, mbe na phenan zɨv na phorgɨv na shama bakɨmen mbɨrga.’
